# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(lib)
add_subdirectory(ut_balancing)
add_subdirectory(ut_blob_depot)
add_subdirectory(ut_blob_depot_fat)
add_subdirectory(ut_donor)
add_subdirectory(ut_group_reconfiguration)
add_subdirectory(ut_huge)
add_subdirectory(ut_read_only_vdisk)
add_subdirectory(ut_osiris)
add_subdirectory(ut_replication)
add_subdirectory(ut_scrub)
add_subdirectory(ut_vdisk_restart)
add_subdirectory(ut_restart_pdisk)
add_subdirectory(ut_read_only_pdisk)
add_subdirectory(ut_stop_pdisk)

add_executable(ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage)


target_link_libraries(ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-core-base
  core-blobstorage-dsproxy
  core-blobstorage-groupinfo
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-lib
  blobstorage-vdisk-common
  blobstorage-vdisk-scrub
)

target_allocator(ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)

target_link_options(ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/acceleration.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/assimilation.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/block_race.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/counting_events.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/deadlines.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/decommit_3dc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/defrag.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/discover.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/ds_proxy_lwtrace.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/encryption.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/extra_block_checks.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/gc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/gc_quorum_3dc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/get.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/get_block.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/group_reconfiguration.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/incorrect_queries.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/index_restore_get.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/main.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/mirror3dc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/mirror3of4.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/monitoring.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/multiget.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/patch.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/recovery.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/sanitize_groups.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/scrub_fast.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/shred.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/snapshots.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/space_check.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/sync.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/ut_helpers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/validation.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/vdisk_malfunction.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

vcs_info(ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-blobstorage-ut_blobstorage
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
